text7:
To all the foreigners who may be looking for an english review among the Korean comments. 

I do not own many blushers so  I cannot compare this to other high-end brands. At first, I was surprised with how red this blusher was. This is a RED blusher. It is imperative for on-e to control the product usage to avoid looking like a clown. I should also mention that this product does not come with a brush, which depending on the person might not be a huge deal. There are light shimmers in this product which leaves the skin looking more 'healthy' so for me, it was nice to use this both as a blusher/highlighter. It compliments the 'dewy skin look'' especially if you use a dewy foundation. I genuinely enjoyed the shimmers more than I thought. It looks very natural! It was also long lasting for me as well. There were no residue left on my mask and even though this blusher is red, it still leaves a nice natural finish.  
Plus this case is very cute!
